meaningMnemonic: If you do <radical>yoga</radical> <radical>correct</radical>ly, you will not only <kanji>prolong</kanji> your body but your life!
readingMnemonic: You can <kanji>prolong</kanji> your life with correct yoga techniques, but unfortunately, if you ever stop doing yoga after you've started this prolonging process, it will just <reading>en</reading>d (えん) suddenly.
